error.notfound.message: The page you're looking for is unavailable or there's an error in the URL. Please check the URL and try again.
library.detail.page.heading: Content library
library.detail.component.showingCount: Showing {currentViewRange} of {total} total, sorted by date added, ascending
library.detail.aside.title: Adding content to your library
library.detail.aside.text.1: Add components to your library for use in courses. Note that the slug becomes part of the usage ID and definition ID, and cannot be changed.
library.detail.aside.text.2: Components are listed in the order in which they are added, with the most recently added at the bottom.
library.detail.block.delete.modal.title: Delete this component?
library.detail.block.delete.modal.body: Deleting this component is permanent and cannot be undone.
library.detail.sidebar.adding.heading: Adding content to your library
library.detail.sidebar.adding.first: Add components to your library for use in courses.
library.detail.sidebar.adding.second: Components are listed in the order in which they are added, with the most recently added at the bottom.
library.detail.sidebar.using.heading: Using library content in courses
library.detail.sidebar.using.first: Use library content in courses by adding the "library_content" policy key to the Advanced Module List in the course's Advanced Settings, then adding a Randomized Content Block to your courseware. In the settings for each Randomized Content Block, select this library as the source library, and specify the number of problems to be randomly selected and displayed to each student.
library.server.error.generic: We had an issue contacting the server. Please try again later!
library.common.fields.license.label: License type
library.common.fields.license.attributio: Allow others to copy, distribute, display and perform your copyrighted work but only if they give credit the way you request. Currently, this option is required.
library.common.fields.license.noncommerc: Allow others to copy, distribute, display and perform your work - and derivative works based upon it - but for noncommercial purposes only.
library.common.fields.license.no_derivat: Allow others to copy, distribute, display and perform only verbatim copies of your work, not derivative works based upon it. This option is incompatible with "Share Alike".
library.common.fields.license.share_alik: Allow others to distribute derivative works only under a license identical to the license that governs your work. This option is incompatible with "No Derivatives".
library.common.license.cc.preface: Creative Commons licensed content, with terms as follows:
library.common.license..preview.title: License preview
library.common.license..preview.message: The following message will be displayed where appropriate:
library.edit.page.heading: Content library
library.edit.title.label: Library title *
library.edit.description.label: Library description *
library.edit.description.placeholder: e.g. This library contains a collection of CS problems.
library.edit.type.label: Library type *
library.edit.public_learning.label: Allow public learning
library.edit.public_read.label: Allow public read
library.edit.aside.title: Editing your library details
library.edit.aside.text: Edit the details of your library using the form on the left.
library.course_import.page.heading: Course import
To import a course, you will need to be an admin of that course.
If you do not see your course here, contact the course owners and ask them for access.
library.course_import.aside.import_task_: Previous imports will show if at least one import is scheduled.
To schedule a new import, click on "Show importable courses" and select the desired course to import the blocks from.
library.course_import.new_import.label: Import course
library.course_import.list_item.title: Import of {courseId}
library.form.generic.error.title: We couldn't save your changes.
library.form.generic.error.description: Please check your entries and try again.
library.form.field.error.empty: This field may not be blank.
library.form.field.error.empty.title: Enter a library name
library.form.field.error.mismatch.org: The organization must be selected from the options list.
library.form.field.error.invalid.slug: Enter a valid “slug” consisting of Unicode letters, numbers, underscores, or hyphens.
library.form.title.label: Library name
library.form.org.label: Organization
library.form.org.help: The public organization name for your library. This cannot be changed.
library.form.slug.label: Library ID
library.form.slug.help: The unique code that identifies this library. Note: This is part of your library URL, so no spaces or special characters are allowed. This cannot be changed.
library.form.modal.title: Unsaved changes
library.form.modal.description: Are you sure you want to leave this page? Changes you made will be lost if you proceed.
library.block.page.heading: Component
library.block.aside.title: Adding content to your library
library.block.aside.text.1: Add a component to your library for use in courses.
library.list.empty.body: Content libraries provide a flexible way to author content for use in one or many courses. Additionally, you can author content prior to knowing its exact course location, and easily include it in your course later.
library.list.empty.heading: Add your first library to get started
library.access.page.heading: User Access
library.access.aside.title: Library Access Roles
library.access.aside.text.first: There are three access roles for libraries: User, Staff, and Admin.
library.access.aside.text.second: Library Users can view library content and can reference or use library components in their courses, but they cannot edit the contents of a library.
library.access.aside.text.third: Library Staff are content co-authors. They have full editing privileges on the contents of a library.
library.access.aside.text.fourth: Library Admins have full editing privileges and can also add and remove other team members. There must be at least one user with the Admin role in a library.
library.access.well.title: Add More Users to This Library
library.access.well.text: Grant other members of your course team access to this library. New library users must have an active Studio account.
library.access.form.title: Grant Access to this Library
library.access.form.email.help: Provide the email address of the user you want to add
library.access.form.email.label: Email
library.access.info.admin_unlock: Promote another member to Admin to remove this user's admin rights
library.access.info.author: Author
library.access.modal.remove.title: Are you sure?
library.access.modal.remove.body: Are you sure you want to delete {email} from the library "{library}"?
library.access.modal.remove_admin.title: Are you sure?
library.access.modal.remove_admin.body: Are you sure you want to revoke admin privileges for {email} from the library "{library}"?
library.list.page.heading: Libraries
library.list.filter.title: Find a library
library.list.filter.options.org.label: Organization
library.list.filter.options.type.label: Type
library.list.aside.title: New to Studio?
library.list.aside.text: Click "Looking for help with Studio" at the bottom of the page to access our continually updated documentation and other Studio resources.
